main event: A witness in Torrington, Connecticut observed a glowing object in the sky that changed color and moved in different directions on February 8, 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared as a light that started in the southeast, moved to the northeast, and then to the north, changing color from white to red, white, and yellow before turning white again.
The witness had previously reported a similar UFO sighting in Torrington on February 8, 1960.
The witness had 16 years of experience working on guided missile projects for the U.S. Army Air Force and had a longstanding interest in UFO phenomena.
No photographs of the object were obtained, but the witness provided a detailed description of its appearance and movements.
sighted object: a glowing, round object that changed color
